knimeNode.name: Term vector
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a term vector for each term.

fullDescription.intro: This node creates a term vector for each term to represent the terms by the vector space model. The values of the feature vectors can be specified as boolean values or as values of a specified column i.e. an tf*idf column.
fullDescription.option: If checked tags are ignored when comparing terms.
If checked an bitvector will be created indicating whether a certain document contains a term or not.

If Bitvector setting is not checked it is possible to specify the column to use as feature vector values. The column can i.e. contain tf*idf values which are than used as values of the feature vector. Be aware that you have to compute these values before using this node. To do so i.e. the frequency calculation nodes can be used.

ports.inPort: The input table containing the bag of words.
ports.outPort: An output table containing the terms with the related term vectors.
